name: Volt
description: Volt is an oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its classic screen and a box-shaped body resembling a cat, Volt is a unique and stylish addition to the team. Equipped with a pair of handDown arms and legs, it can navigate both physical and digital environments with ease. The helmet addon enhances its capabilities, making it more versatile and adaptable to various tasks. Volt's ability scores and skills reflect its mechanical prowess, while its alignment showcases its dedication to the advancement of technology and the pursuit of knowledge.
